reviews.name: Sarah M.
reviews.text: Dr. Aletaha and her team are amazing! They made me feel comfortable and explained everything thoroughly. My teeth have never looked better. The office is modern and clean, and the staff is incredibly friendly.

reviews.name: James T.
reviews.text: I had a dental emergency and they got me in right away. Dr. Houshmand was gentle and professional. The pain relief was immediate, and they worked with my insurance to make it affordable. Highly recommend!

reviews.name: Meghan R.
reviews.text: Beautiful office and kind staff. I felt heard the entire time. Highly recommend.
